podcast.episodeTitle: Talk To Me In Korean Ep.14

typing.desc: Say goodbye to 'hunt and peck' typing. Build muscle memory from basic letters to full articles with our built-in smart typing practice. Experience the rhythm of native Korean typing directly in your browser without installing extra software.
typing.feature1Desc: Letter-level error correction helps you quickly correct key position memory.
typing.feature2Desc: Smart prediction highlights the next key for instant visual feedback. Build muscle memory naturally through fluid practice, no rote memorization needed.
